item.content:encoded:
Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

SPF 40 offers a bit more protection than SPF 30, blocking about 97.5% of UVB rays. It’s a good choice if you have fair skin, are outdoors for extended periods, or engage in activities that increase sun exposure, like swimming or hiking. Just like any sunscreen, it’s essential to apply it generously and reapply every two hours (or more often if you’re sweating or swimming) for the best protection. Do you have any specific activities or concerns in mind?
